      • checkAllRoom

        public Room checkAllRoom(java.util.Calendar startDate,
                java.lang.String roomType,
                int numNight,
                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> roomNumber)
        Check that the given start date, room type and number of nights are allowed to be booked in. The variables are received from System Manager Class.
        Parameters:
        startDate - the start date of the reservation
        roomType - the type of room it required single/double/triple
        numNight - the number of night it required
        roomNumber - this is an array list of string of room numbers to cross check in System Manager Class
        Returns:
        Room It will return the object Room

      • loopThroughRoom

        public void loopThroughRoom(java.lang.String hotelName)
        This method is called via System Manager to loop through all the rooms in the particular hotel.
        Parameters:
        hotelName - The hotel name will be given for printing. It will return nothing and only printing.

      • addReservationViaRoom

        public boolean addReservationViaRoom(java.lang.String username,
                            java.util.Calendar startDate,
                            int numNight,
                            java.lang.String roomType)
        To add reservation into the 2d LinkedHashMap
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the user that want to book given via System Manager
        startDate - The start date of the reservation
        numNight - The number of nights they want to book
        roomType - The type of room they want to book. Either single/double/triple
        Returns:
        checkStatus It will return a true or false indicating whether adding to the LinkedHashMap has been sucessfull or not.

        To add room into a particular hotel.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - the room number of the room that you want to add
        roomType - the type of the room it will be either single/double/triple There is no return.

      • cancelViaHotel

        public boolean cancelViaHotel(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String roomNum,
                     int month,
                     int date,
                     int numNight)
        Cancelling a particular reservation.
        Parameters:
        username - The name user that want to cancel the room
        roomNum - The room number that wants to be cancelled
        month - The month of the booking
        date - The date of the booking that wants to be cancelled
        numNight - How many more days after the date given that want to be cancelled.
        Returns:
        status It will return a true or a false depending on the outcome

      • checkReservationExistInRoom

        public boolean checkReservationExistInRoom(java.lang.String username,
                                  java.lang.String roomNum,
                                  int month,
                                  int date,
                                  int numNight)
        To check whether a reservation exist.
        Parameters:
        username - Need username to check
        roomNum - Need the room number
        month - Need the particular month
        date - Need the particular date
        numNight - Need the number of nights
        Returns:
        It will return a boolean status either true or false depending on the outcome.

      • manualInsert

        public boolean manualInsert(java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String month,
                   java.lang.String date,
                   java.lang.String numNight,
                   java.lang.String roomType,
                   java.lang.String numRoom)
        To insert a manual reservation, the inputs are received via System Manager. The function will check for the particular hotel room and then go deeper to room.
        Parameters:
        username - Username for the reservation name
        month - Month for the reservation
        date - Date for the reservation
        numNight - Number of nights for the reservation
        roomType - The particular room type.
        numRoom - The room number
        Returns:
        It will return a status true or false depending on the outcome.
